Name: Coptic textile
Description: Almost circular orbiculus made in tapestry of different colours. It has a symmetrical decoration formed by two birds, complete with collar and crest and with their heads turned towards the middle. They are separated by a central motif (a large tree or palmette), marking the axis of symmetry. In the lower part, we find birds facing each other and stylized vegetal motifs. The piece is trimmed with a border of coloured chevrons.
